claims.claim: Focusing on educating and building up the top 10% of youth can positively impact the broader community.
claims.quote: If we build up and educate the top 10%, they can turn around and help lead and educate the other 90%.

claims.claim: Leaders among the youth should be the primary focus for receiving resources and education for community impact.
claims.quote: So my focus is how can you send me your, your leaders, send me your bosses, send me your students, your impact drivers, and then turn I'll provide them with the re resources, the experience and understanding, and then they can go back into their, They're a village and they can do the same for those that I can't reach.
